tweet: I love seeing @Kaleido_io, a full stack #blockchain as a service marketplace, featured as a SaaS product on the @awscloud platform, as well as @chainlink offered as a partner service on the @Kaleido_io marketplace. #Chainlink is becoming the industry standard for #smartcontracts  https://t.co/d8QgC0D76i

Everyone is so focused on currency but really the innovation is going to come in smart contracts. It's going to drive automation like we haven't seen before. Chainlink is going to be at the center of why that happens.

I'm not just invested in #Chainlink because it could solved the #oracle problem, I'm invested because it could also solve the confidential #smartcontract problem and the scalable smart contract problem through the use of off-chain computation. That's a potential gold mine. $LINK

https://t.co/38qJ4D2N07 is doing amazing things for #SupplyChain efficiency.  @chainlink is helping them do them!  #blockchain #dlt #logistics #Ethereum #chainlink #automation  “Platform Preview #3: Creating #SmartContracts & #IoT Triggers” by @morphcrypto  https://t.co/HqSeetBMJL
